you-sent: Here is the information you have sent us

not-arrived.paragraph-one: We are currently experiencing very high volumes of requests. It is taking significantly longer than usual to resolve requests and it may take up to 20 working days.
not-arrived.paragraph-two: We investigate each case individually and in date order. We will respond to you as soon as possible.
not-arrived.paragraph-three: Please do not chase for updates as this reduces ability to respond in a timely manner.
not-arrived.paragraph-four: We will review the information you have provided and let you know if a replacement BRP is required.
not-arrived.thanks: If you need to report errors on multiple BRPs, you must report the issues with each BRP separately.  We will then advise you what to do next.
